title: Variables Likely to Have Clusters
question_text: Which variable would most likely have clusters in its distribution?

choices.text: The SAT scores for a group of randomly selected males and females.
The number of bananas eaten each day by a group of randomly selected Republicans and Democrats.
The hair lengths for a group of randomly selected 5th graders.
The number of steps taken in a day by a group of randomly selected emergency room nurses.
The length of time it takes to brush teeth for a randomly selected group of dental hygienists and dentists.
